ch0120_00_lusamine_salon/8201_2002_01_10: OK, let’s talk for a bit, then, shall we?
ch0120_00_lusamine_salon/8201_2003_01_10:
[Name:PlayerNickname ], I’m so happy to
see you again!
ch0120_00_lusamine_salon/8201_2101_02_10: I’m sure it’ll come in handy.
ch0120_00_lusamine_salon/8201_2102_01_10:
[Name:PlayerNickname ], I got this as a
gift for you.
ch0120_00_lusamine_salon/8201_2102_02_10:
If you like it, I’ll bring you more. Don’t be
shy about using it!
ch0120_00_lusamine_salon/8201_2103_01_10:
[Name:PlayerNickname ], I want to give
you this as a token of my gratitude for
everything you do.
ch0120_00_lusamine_salon/8201_2103_02_10:
You can depend on me whenever you need,
you know. I want to help you if I can.
ch0120_00_lusamine_salon/8201_2103_03_10: You’re important to me. Like family.
ch0120_00_lusamine_salon/8201_2202_01_10:
[Name:PlayerNickname ], you always
have such interesting things to say.
ch0120_00_lusamine_salon/8201_2203_01_10:
I always look forward to having a nice,
long talk with you!
ch0120_00_lusamine_salon/8201_2302_01_10: Oh, you! Is this for me? Thank you so much.
ch0120_00_lusamine_salon/8201_2301_01_10:
Oh, thank you, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
I’ll take great care when I use this.
ch0120_00_lusamine_salon/8201_2301_02_10:
But on the other hand, it feels like a waste
to actually use it, given how happy it makes
me. Ho ho ho, whatever shall I do?
ch0120_00_lusamine_salon/8201_2402_01_10:
Well then. Let’s continue this some
other time.
ch0120_00_lusamine_salon/8201_2401_01_10: That was a lot of fun! The time just flew by.
ch0120_00_lusamine_salon/8201_2401_02_10:
I keep going on about all sorts of things,
don’t I. Maybe you’re just good at getting
me to talk!
ch0120_00_lusamine_salon/8001_0701_01_10:
This is a very comfortable space, isn’t it?
It feels as though it’s full of warm light.
ch0120_00_lusamine_salon/8001_0701_02_10:
Let’s keep this place’s warmth alive by
continuing these chats of ours, shall we?
ch0120_00_lusamine_salon/8002_0701_01_10:
My children will always need me by their
side as their mother. At least, that’s what
I’d always thought.
ch0120_00_lusamine_salon/8002_0701_02_10:
But maybe I needed Lillie and Gladion more
than they needed me.
ch0120_00_lusamine_salon/8002_0701_03_10:
Perhaps I need to find the strength to go on
without relying on the two of them.
ch0120_00_lusamine_salon/8003_0701_01_10:
Parents are role models for their children as
they grow.
ch0120_00_lusamine_salon/8003_0701_02_10:
Raising kids isn’t just about doing things for
them. Being a good example is another form
of love.
ch0120_00_lusamine_salon/8003_0701_03_10:
I think I’ve come to believe that more than I
could before.
ch0120_00_lusamine_salon/8003_0701_04_10:
Maybe because a certain someone was MY
role model here on Pasio.
